title: Dataset Paper Entry
description: Schema for the properties of each dataset.

available_online.description: Indicates if the dataset is available for download or access online.

has_real_data.description: Indicates if the dataset contains real-world (non-simulated) data.

has_simulated_data.description: Indicates if the dataset contains simulated data.

has_ground_truth.description: Indicates if the dataset includes ground truth labels or annotations.

has_frames.description: Indicates if the dataset also contains frames (or non-neuromorphic data).

has_biases.description: Indicates if the dataset specifies the bias values used for the sensors.

distribution_methods.description: The method by which the dataset is distributed (e.g., Dropbox, GitHub, etc.).

file_formats.description: The file formats in which the dataset is available (e.g., Binary File, CSV, etc.).

availability_comment.description: Optional comments or additional information about the dataset distribution or characteristics.

size_gb.description: The size of the dataset in gigabytes.

size_type.description: Describes how the size_gb is measured (e.g., compressed or uncompressed).

format.description: Format of the dataset available at the link (e.g., 'AEDAT', 'HDF5').

doi.description: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for the dataset link, if available.

available.description: Indicates if the dataset is available at this link.

comment.description: Optional comment about the link (e.g., 'Primary source', 'Requires Login').
